chapters.title: Chapter 3: Hill of the Golden Dawn
chapters.info: Tell Lewin, p. 91 (104)—Young man from Emond's Field, now one of Perrin's soldiers. A bean-pole of a man with a thick mustache in the Taraboner style. He carries Perrin's Red Eagle banner. He is Dannil's brother. See also Lewin, Dannil.
